title: Chapter 2933: Chapter 1540: Mutual Win-Win Is Nonsense, Void Giant Master Creates A Sky Realm_3
body:
Chapter 2933: Chapter 1540: Mutual Win-Win Is Nonsense, Void Giant Master Creates A Sky Realm_3

Chapter 2933: Chapter 1540: Mutual Win-win Is Nonsense, Void Giant Master Creates a Sky Realm_3

“What kind of defense is this?”

Yue Gongli was absolutely horrified.

The demonic transformation of the Di Ying Holy Plant, which apparently started with the power of the Holy Emperor’s Original Body to deal with a Cutting Path… okay, albeit a measure of combat strength, was only of the Demi-Saint level Xu Xiaoshou. Did it really need to resort to quantity over quality to obliterate the golden light?

What is this thing?

Is Xu Xiaoshou really still human?

With this golden stuff, Dao Xuanji has to deal with him?

Could Xu Xiaoshou’s defense be broken if she kept attacking him for three days and three nights without moving?

She could only break defense on the spot!

“Boom!”

After a brief moment, the golden light was broken through.

As the Ultimate Giant shook violently, Yue Gongli, hidden in the Yin Coffin, also heard a scream of unparalleled shrillness echoing from the end of the world:

“Ssss!!!”

The scream, like the cry of a cat and the wailing of a ghost, echoed like a plague of the mind, sweeping through everything.

A scream from the Di Ying Holy Plant?

Was it attacked?

Who attacked it?

“Pfft!”

In the Yin Coffin, before Yue Gongli could fully understand, his head suddenly contorted and twisted grotesquely, and he vomited blood.

Just by hearing it from afar, his whole body convulsed like that of a mad dog, and a dense aura of the Evil God’s Energy emanated from him.

That evil energy was quickly reabsorbed into his body.

Yue Gongli returned to normal and opened his eyes inside the coffin.

The violent mixing of the powers of the Holy Ancestor, Heavenly Ancestor, and evil god flickered in his eyes but quickly subsided.

After a short while, he curled up his legs, held his knees with one hand, and covered his mouth with the other hand, letting out a cry of frightened disbelief:

“Lord Shou, what is this sound? I’m scared…”

…

“Attacked, Passive Points, +1.”

“Asked a question, Passive Points, +1.”

The Information Bar notifications popped up steadily, even if Acalanātha’s defense was broken, Xu Xiaoshou, as the Ultimate Giant, had no issues, demonstrating incredibly strong resistance.

After a moment of contemplation, Xu Xiaoshou effortlessly calmed the surge of the evil god aura within him, then said calmly:

“That is the sound of one who is about to die, yet remains unaware of it.”

In the Yin Coffin, Yue Gongli’s eyes lit up, and he swung his fist vigorously:

“So arrogant!”

“Youth should be arrogant!”

“Go for it, Lord Shou! If I were thirty years younger and without the nuisance of the power of the ancestral source, I would definitely stand shoulder to shoulder with you… fight… Hey, what the…?”

Yue Gongli’s speech was cut short as he realized that the Yin Coffin was taking off.

A probe with his saint’s will revealed that the Ultimate Giant had not pursued the attack, seizing the opportunity to attack the main body of the Di Ying Holy Plant.

Instead, it had grasped the coffin that sheltered him and hefted it up with two fingers that were bigger than the Heavenly Pillar!

Yue Gongli’s Adam’s apple bobbed, “Lord Shou, what do you mean by this?”

“I told you, it’s the sound of one who is about to die, yet remains unaware.”

As the thunderous voice settled, Yue Gongli felt the entire Yin Coffin deforming, grotesquely deforming!

The coffin was being assaulted by colossal forces from both ends, more than it could withstand.

The top of the coffin bulged upward, while the bottom also bulged downward.

At this moment, the Yin Coffin, one of the Great Psionic Weapons, seemed as if it was about to be crushed by the two fingers of the Ultimate Giant!

“Damn it!”

“No, you can’t, you mustn’t! Stop it!”

Yue Gongli, as if he had just sat down on a hot stove, leaped up from the searing pain in his tender parts and began running back and forth inside the coffin:

“Don’t do this, Lord Shou, attack her, why are you squashing my coffin?”

“I’m your friend, not your enemy, our enemy is the Di Ying Saint… Stop, stop!”

“Lord Shou I beg you, don’t crush my coffin, something terrible will happen! I’m not lying to you! Stop!”

Something terrible happening?

What could be more terrifying than an Ultimate Giant not taking your bait, not being deceived, and instead deciding to crush your turtle shell?

“I will uproot the Di Ying Holy Plant.”

“And before that, you will exit the ruins first.”

The fingers of the Ultimate Giant pressed harder.

Embodying the Life Upanishad and the Body of Devour, drawing vitality from nature, the energy was nearly endless.

The power, likewise, flowed without interruption.

The Ultimate Giant had truly achieved the freedom to turn on and off at will, and to act utterly mad in between!

“Ssss!!!”

In the darkness, another piercing scream arose.

In the distance, the sound of something tearing through the sky like thunder suggested an unbelievable, massive monster was rapidly approaching.

Clearly, the Di Ying Holy Plant was enraged, coming angrily to strike.

Yet at this moment, the Ultimate Giant ignored the approaching threat from behind and still targeted the Yin Coffin, the “teammate” who was supposed to have a win-win cooperation with him.

“Stop it!”

Yue Gongli finally started to scream, “Let’s cooperate, let’s not hurt each other anymore… I can fight! I really can fight!”

“Too late.”

“I alone can fight just as well.”

Golden light began to emerge from the fingertips of the Ultimate Giant, and being unable to crush the coffin with mere brute strength, it utilized the Exploding Posture.

Crack!

Instantly, the talisman paper on the Yin Coffin shattered into dozens of pieces.

The fear in Yue Gongli’s scream intensified, “Don’t do it, someone will die, let’s cooperate! I’ll tell you first, there’s a problem at the Ran Ming ruins, people are dying right now!”

“That’s perfect.”

Crack, crack, crack, crack…

Dozens more talisman papers were shattered.

Yue Gongli was dumbfounded, clutching his head and repeatedly sitting up and lying down in the coffin.

You don’t believe me?

How can you not believe me?

He had never heard the story of “The Boy Who Cried Wolf,” but at this moment Yue Gongli bitterly understood its moral.

“I’m really not joking!”
